20110121233122.000|20110121233123.000|CC1|DRUGS, THE HIT NEW SHOW SKINS.  
20110121233123.000|20110121233127.000|CC1|SOME PARENTS ARE CALLING IT THE 
20110121233127.000|20110121233128.000|CC1|MOST DANGEROUS SHOW EVER FOR    
20110121233128.000|20110121233128.000|CC1|KIDS.                           
20110121233128.000|20110121233130.000|CC1|>> MTV UNDER FIRE THIS MORNING. 
20110121233130.000|20110121233133.000|CC1|>> A RACY TEEN DRAMA THAT       
20110121233133.000|20110121233137.000|CC1|CRITICS SAY IS TOO EXPLICIT FOR 
20110121233137.000|20110121233137.000|CC1|TELEVISION.                     
20110121233137.000|20110121233142.000|CC1|>> A FRONT PAGE HEADLINE BLARES 
20110121233142.000|20110121233143.000|CC1|A RACY SHOW ABOUT TEENAGERS     
20110121233143.000|20110121233143.000|CC1|STEPS BACK FROM THE BOUNDARY.   
20110121233143.000|20110121233147.000|CC1|NOW A LETTER HAS BEEN SENT TO   
20110121233147.000|20110121233148.000|CC1|CONGRESS ACCUSING MTV OF AIRING 
20110121233148.000|20110121233148.000|CC1|CHILD PORNOGRAPHY.              
20110121233148.000|20110121233152.000|CC1|>> THE SHOW IS A LITTLE MORE    
20110121233152.000|20110121233154.000|CC1|RAW AND RELENTLESS IN ITS       
20110121233154.000|20110121233157.000|CC1|PORTRAYAL OF TEENAGE SEXUALITY, 
20110121233157.000|20110121233158.000|CC1|ALCOHOL USE AND DRUG USE THAN   
20110121233158.000|20110121233202.000|CC1|ANY SHOW WE HAVE SEEN IN PRIME  
20110121233202.000|20110121233202.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110121233202.000|20110121233203.000|CC1|>> THE SKIN SCANDAL CAUSED TACO 
20110121233203.000|20110121233204.000|CC1|BELL TO PULL OUT OF THE SHOW.   
20110121233204.000|20110121233205.000|CC1|SKINS IS A SCRIPTED SERIES      
20110121233205.000|20110121233207.000|CC1|BASED ON A HIT BRITISH SHOW.    
20110121233207.000|20110121233209.000|CC1|AMONG THE CONCERNS, THE AGE OF  
20110121233209.000|20110121233212.000|CC1|THE ACTORS.                     
20110121233212.000|20110121233213.000|CC1|SOME ARE AS YOUNG AS 15.        
20110121233213.000|20110121233214.000|CC1|>> IT DEFINITELY IS A LITTLE    
20110121233214.000|20110121233214.000|CC1|TABOO.                          
20110121233214.000|20110121233217.000|CC1|>> WE SPOKE TO RACHEL AND OTHER 
20110121233217.000|20110121233218.000|CC1|YOUNG STARS OF THE SHOW AT A    
20110121233218.000|20110121233219.000|CC1|RECENT TV CRITICS ASSOCIATION   
20110121233219.000|20110121233220.000|CC1|GATHERING.                      
20110121233220.000|20110121233227.000|CC1|>> IT'S IMPORTANT THAT WE TALK  
20110121233227.000|20110121233227.000|CC1|ABOUT IT.

20110121233228.000|20110121233229.000|CC1|MESSAGE THAT SKINS IS TRYING TO 
20110121233229.000|20110121233229.000|CC1|GET ACROSS THAT KIDS ARE DOING  
20110121233229.000|20110121233230.000|CC1|THIS.

20110121233750.000|20110121233752.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL BOROUGH IN A NEGATIVE 
20110121233752.000|20110121233753.000|CC1|LIGHT.                          
20110121233753.000|20110121233754.000|CC1|>> 23 MILLION VIEWERS TUNED IN
